turkish_example_sentence: Sen dün akşam bizimle restoranda olmuş olsaydın, harika İtalyan yemeklerini tatardın
english_example_sentence: If you had been with us at the restaurant yesterday evening, you would have tasted the wonderful Italian dishes
russian_example_sentence: Если бы ты был с нами в ресторане вчера вечером, ты бы попробовал замечательные итальянские блюда
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Sen dün akşam bizimle restoranda ______, harika İtalyan yemeklerini tatardın
